segment_text: I saw Marie. She was lying in bed in her slippers and housecoat.
Beads of sweat were large and evident on her forehead, emphasizing her distress.
I stayed by her side, worrying intensely about her condition, not visible to others.
The hospital room was simply furnished, typical of the era.
The afternoon light softly illuminated the room, adding tense yet hopeful ambiance.
